Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: To convert PDF to text for free, users can use an online tool that allows them to upload up to 20 PDF files and wait for the conversion process to finish. The converted files can be downloaded individually or as a ZIP archive. This conversion is useful for editing and manipulating text within a PDF and reducing the file size. The conversion tool is safe and secure, automatically purging all uploads and conversions after one hour.
